description: This agreement is for leasing a property located at Powai from Arshdeep singh to Ayush Chandekar for a period of one month starting from 15th Feb, 25.
nonNegotiableClauses: The property shall be used exclusively for residential purposes.
The Tenant shall not sublet the premises or use it for any commercial activities without the prior written consent of the Landlord.
Upon termination, the Tenant agrees to vacate the premises and return all keys and access devices to the Landlord
Guests may stay for up to 20 days without written permission from the Landlord

deadlines.description: Deposit refunded to the Tenant, subject to deductions for any damages or outstanding dues.

termsAndConditions: The tenant agrees to pay a monthly rent of ₹50k
The tenant shall deposit a security amount of ₹NaN
The security deposit may be used to cover any damages or unpaid rent
The Tenant agrees to maintain the property in good condition and promptly notify the Landlord of any necessary repairs.
The Tenant shall be responsible for minor repairs, while the Landlord shall handle major repairs unless damage is caused by the Tenant's negligence.
The Tenant shall be responsible for the payment of all utilities, including electricity, water, and gas, unless otherwise agreed upon.
The Tenant shall not make any alterations or improvements to the property without the prior written consent of the Landlord.
Pets are allowed on the premises.
The Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the parties and supersedes all prior agreements or understandings, whether written or oral
In case of loss or damage, the Tenant shall pay ₹400 for replacement
Arshdeep , 983932902 will inspect the property if unoccupied for 4 or more consecutive days
Tenant will vacate the property in good condition at the end of the lease term
Landlord has the right to enter the property with proper notice
Tenant is responsible for paying rent on time
